author: Chloe Bryan
title: Keeping a list of what I do every day is helping me manage quarantine anxiety
description: One of the things I've found most difficult about self-quarantining is the lack of organized time. There's no morning commute, no trot down a flight of stairs for a coffee break, no anticipatory subway ride from work to see a friend, no cathartic sigh when I …
content: One of the things I've found most difficult about self-quarantining is the lack of organized time. There's no morning commute, no trot down a flight of stairs for a coffee break, no anticipatory subway ride from work to see a friend, no cathartic sigh when I … [+3044 chars]
